plot: Life's a beach for surfers Brady and McKenzie -- until a rogue wave magically transports them inside the classic '60s beach party flick, Wet Side Story, where a full-blown rivalry between bikers and surfers threatens to erupt. There, amidst a sea of surfing, singing and dancing, Brady and Mack accidentally change the storyline, and the film's dreamy hero and heroine fall for them instead of for each other!

m.role: Pretty Boy: Tanner. Subverted in that Mack calls him 'the mannequin with six rows of teeth' the first time she sees him.

Shirtless Scene: Inevitable considering the setting, but an extremely gratuitous one occurs as Brady and Mack are leaving the Wet Side Story universe - Brady's shirt magically opens between shots and flutters open in the wind, for no discernible reason.
Surfer Dude: Wet Side Story's surfers.

f.role: Naive Every Girl: Lela, who just can't understand why her brother's gang and the surfers can't get along.
Sassy Black Woman: Big Momma. Her Establishing Character Moment occurs when she dances a little with one of the surfers, then slaps him playfully and scolds him for taking her away from her cooking.

name: Teen Beach Movie
